column4: I see you are trying to setup a network share.  Do you want the directory to be on the Linux machine or the Windows one?
The share is from an ubuntu box.
Maybe someone else has helped you.  I can give you what I use.  I share it to windows, mac and linux machines.
that'd be cool if I could look at your conf. I'm about to paste mine to a pastebin for [vali] to look at.
My config file is at  http://pastebin.com/f7d0e936c
